title: [Large-Scale] Educational Infographic Design: Color Utilization and Memory Reinforcement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design principles and experience with graphic tools
context.additional_context: Exploring optimization strategies for educational materials through color-based cognitive effect experiments in VR environments

learning_goals: Ability to select infographic design elements based on color theory aligned with educational objectives
Measurement of color-specific memory recall effects in VR simulations using quasi-experimental research methods
Ability to propose optimal color arrangement strategies according to learning content types

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
